formalText: There's just a lot of tension.
He recognizes the closer he drives
to going home,
it's just this build-up of tension.
And there's just all this anger just kind of building up and
he shut down everything.
He's not good at being honest with himself.

His issue with having this mild deformity in his penis is this huge shame that has been the major defining kind of thing that's going out of his life and recognizing the power of that shame in his God.
So he's really trying to be patient with himself.
Having the physical deformity and her cutting off sex 7 years ago
confirmed his worst fears that he wasn't lovable.
He's going to have to get intimacy back into his life.
And this is not an unreasonable thing for him to want.
So he's got to do something.
He's got to take some action to make this happen.
He's recognizing not sitting on his emotions and being dishonest with himself is not going to get him there.
So what he feels is he's putting all this intimacy out here and she's just pushing him away, and he said he can't just turn it on like a spigot.
He was sitting there and he physically felt like he was going to vomit and he was shaking. He could barely talk.
He was able to tell her that he's feeling such anger and rage right now that he can't even function.
He said he's so fucking tired of this.
He's living this lie.
He's done.
He's done with this shit.
And he just doesn't want to hurt anybody else.
He's bringing nothing to the table and there's just absolutely nothing but anger and rage.
He's got no compassion today.
He recognized that the other kicker in that was that whenever they talk about intimacy
it's like they're not talking the same language and she says she's starting to get a little defensive, and then the tears are welling up and that kind of thing. She says
all of the things that she does for him to show him how much she cares, her love and affection for him and all the intimacy that she gives, he's just not there for that.
It's about sexual intimacy.
He's not 100% sure but he was able to say what he needs is physical and emotional Intimacy in his life, and he's no longer willing to live without it.
He can't, and it's coming out and he gets that it's painful for him and her and everybody else.
But that's the relationship, and over time and eventually it got to the place where they couldn't have sex at home anymore.
It was pretty much always initiated by him, and they got to the point that the only way they're going to have sex is if they had two or four drinks beforehand.
So they had to get in the self-medicating state before they go there.
He came home after choir practice and she wasn't there, and he just could start to feel it bubbling up.
He has rage and anger.
